projects.name: A Comparative Analysis for Software Fault Detection Using Machine Learning Techniques
projects.description: 1. Collected and pre-processed datasets from NASA, specifically KC1, CM1, and JM1, with a total of 2,109, 498, and 10,884 data points respectively, ensuring data quality and consistency for machine learning analysis. 2. Evaluated the performance of different models using metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. 3. Achieved fault prediction accuracy ranging from 89% to 100% across different models and datasets.

projects.name: Prime Video
projects.description: 1. Created a header for navigation, a content area for displaying videos, and possibly a footer for additional information. 2. Optimized UI responsiveness by implementing CSS media queries to create breakpoints and adjust the layout for various screens.

projects.name: Airport Management System
projects.description: 1. Piloted the development of a mobile-first approach using CSS media queries, enabling the website to adapt flawlessly to various screen sizes and resolutions, reducing bounce rate. 2. Transformed a complex form structure utilizing HTML and PHP to streamline data input and processing, decreasing submission time and improving data accuracy. 3. Engineered a robust MySQL database to streamline and manage flight details, passenger records, and staff information; optimized data retrieval and enhanced system efficiency by reducing query response time.
